question: Pratap Singh Tomar, who recently bagged India’s record 13th Olympic quota 14th Asian Championship, belongs to which game?
explanation: Aishwarya Pratap Singh Tomar bagged India’s 13th Olympic quota in shooting with a bronze in men’s 50m rifle 3 positions at the 14th Asian Championship on November 10, 2019.He is from Madhya Pradesh. He is a part of the junior team trained by Suma Shirur. India had 11 shooters at the 2012 London Olympics and 12 in Rio de Janiero in 2016.
